channel.title: Interfaces? PI
channel.description:
I saw this on a previous server I had which i deleted and didn't get to see the code.. could anyone tell me how i could make something like this: When i click object 4388 interface 18681 is displayed then i get teleported to pos 3100,3481 and while i'm there a smoky screen interface id 16152 is displayed WHILE i'm there? so like when i walk around that smoky screen interface is always on screen while i'm there.. i will be extremely extreeeemly thankful if anyone could tell me if this is possible and how to do it, i would be very pleased if anyone could give me this code. i know it goes in uh clickingobjects.java or something.
Thank you ~Atro

item.title: Interfaces? PI
item.dc:creator: @lifezjoke lifezjoke
item.description:
